org.gbif.checklistbank.search

Class NameUsageSearchIT

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.checklistbank.index.NameUsageIndexerBaseIT
      • org.gbif.checklistbank.search.NameUsageSearchIT

  • public class NameUsageSearchIT
extends NameUsageIndexerBaseIT
    Integration tests using an embedded solr server with the mybatis squirrels test dataset. The solr index will be rebuild before the test using the NameUsageIndexerBaseIT base class.
